articles.title: 40 Indians Killed, 50 Injured In Kuwait Building Fire, PM Takes Stock - NDTV
articles.description: Forty Indians were killed and 50 injured after a fire broke out in a building housing workers in Kuwait's Mangaf city, the Ministry of External Affairs said. The fire, in which 49 people were killed, started at 6 am local time (9 am IST).
